name: Port Stephens Dolphins & Sand Dunes - Full Day Tour
description: Today you’re heading out over the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge, your Driver Guide will provide expert commentary as you travel through the beautiful Hawkesbury Ranges to Port Stephens, it's the perfect picturesque coastal town holiday destination - Just an easy two and half hours drive north of Sydney with a choice of 26 wonderful beaches and beautiful sheltered bays, crystal clear water, snorkeling and kayaking, boutique shopping, whale & dolphin watching, sliding down sand dunes and much much more....
